title: The Vampire
description: He felt the icy hardness of her sharp little teeth on his throat, a strangely soothing sting and an engulfing blackness rising over him.A collection of stories, both fact and fiction, about the mysterious blood-sucking beings who have haunted history and literature for centuries.They are presented by French film director Roger Vadim, who makes it plain that although he does not believe in vampire stories, he believes in what inspired them.THE VAMPIREAll the best vampire stories in the world - Illustrated London NewsA double brandy please - Daily Mail
author: Ornella Volta
